about_the_game:
SPRINT.FIRE is a free-to-play, fast-paced multiplayer arena shooter with a focus on advanced movement and marksmanship. Looking to join the worlds of classic arena shooters and modern "movement" shooters, SPRINT.FIRE delivers quick action and rewarding gameplay kill after kill.

▶ Carve your own path

Wallrun, double-jump, vault, slide, and dash around your enemies bullets. With the ability to chain together moves and build momentum as you do, there are virtually limitless ways to traverse the map and out-maneuver your opponent.

▶ No Microtransactions

In-game cosmetics are unlocked through challenges and multiplayer progression alone. DLC will be available at no cost.

SPRINT.FIRE is a free-to-play, fast-paced multiplayer arena shooter with a focus on advanced movement and marksmanship. Looking to join the worlds of classic arena shooters and modern "movement" shooters, SPRINT.FIRE delivers quick action and rewarding gameplay kill after kill.

▶ Carve your own path

Wallrun, double-jump, vault, slide, and dash around your enemies bullets. With the ability to chain together moves and build momentum as you do, there are virtually limitless ways to traverse the map and out-maneuver your opponent.

▶ No Microtransactions

In-game cosmetics are unlocked through challenges and multiplayer progression alone. DLC will be available at no cost.
name: SPRINT.FIRE

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Any quad core CPU
  • Memory: 16 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GTX 1060
  • DirectX: Version 12
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 15 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 11
  • Processor: AMD Ryzen 7 or Intel i9
  • Memory: 32 GB RAM
  • Graphics: RTX 2070
  • DirectX: Version 12
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 50 GB available space

short_description: SPRINT.FIRE is a free-to-play, fast-paced multiplayer arena shooter with a focus on advanced movement and marksmanship.
